Adamantite limbs are crossbow limbs made from an adamantite bar, requiring 76 Smithing and yielding 62.5 Smithing experience.

Adamantite limbs are attached to a mahogany stock to make an adamant crossbow (u), requiring 61 Fletching and yielding 82 Fletching experience.

'''Adamantite limbs''' are [[crossbow limbs]] made from an [[adamantite bar]], requiring 76 [[Smithing]] and yielding 62.5 Smithing [[experience]].

Adamantite limbs are attached to a [[mahogany stock]] to make an [[adamant crossbow (u)]], requiring 61 [[Fletching]] and yielding 82 Fletching experience.
